overview: A young boy and his paleontologist grandfather uncover a dinosaur egg which, when hatched, causes a series of unforeseeable events in a suburban neighborhood. Along for the ride is big game hunter Jackson Snide who will go to the farthest lengths to make sure a newly hatched dinosaur infant is in his possession. Can Grandpa Archie, David and his closest friends save this baby dinosaur before it's too late?
tagline: Meet a little boy... with a very big problem.
title: David's Dinosaur
